sys_script_include.description: Script Include to return Sys_User information. The calling client-side script passes a sys_id for a Sys_User table record.
sys_script_include.name: GetUserInfo

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_e66239b22f922010a54a821df699b623
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_522137_mailtrax.GetUserInfo</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Script Include to return Sys_User information. The calling client-side script passes a sys_id for a Sys_User table record.</description><name>GetUserInfo</name><script><![CDATA[var GetUserInfo = Class.create();
// Extend the global.AbstractAjaxProcessor class
GetUserInfo.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor,{
    // Define the getcompany function.  
    // Create a GlideRecord for the User table.
    // Use the sysparm_mailingname passed from the client side to retrieve a record from the Mailing List table.
    // Return the company/department for the requested record
    getinfo: function() {
        var userRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        userRecord.get(this.getParameter('u_division'));
        return userRecord.u_division;
    },
    type: 'GetUserInfo'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-16 21:12:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>e66239b22f922010a54a821df699b623</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetUserInfo</sys_name><sys_package display_value="MailTrax" source="x_522137_mailtrax">add2772e2f112010a54a821df699b60b</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="MailTrax">add2772e2f112010a54a821df699b60b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e66239b22f922010a54a821df699b623</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-16 21:17:40</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
